tool_description: Publishes finalized course catalogs with complete scheduling information, making them available to students and academic advisors through various channels.

filter_departments.description: Specific departments to include in catalog

error_messages: Invalid term: The specified term does not exist in the system.
Unsupported format: publication_format must be one of [web, pdf, json, xml].
Invalid sections: One or more include_sections are not recognized.
Department not found: One or more filter_departments do not exist.
Incomplete data: Some courses lack required information for publication.
Publication failed: Unable to generate catalog in the specified format.
usage: Provide term and publication_format as required parameters. Optionally specify include_sections, filter_departments, and publication_status to customize catalog content and format.

publication_id.description: Unique identifier for the published catalog

publication_url.description: URL where the catalog can be accessed

courses_included.description: Total number of courses included in the catalog

publication_date.description: Date and time of catalog publication

catalog_summary.description: Summary statistics about the published catalog
